TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime>
Public Structure KeyTime Implements IEquatable(Of KeyTime)

summary.span: 在動畫的相對過程期間， 執行個體 (Instance) 會指定發生特定主要畫面格的精確時間。

span.span: During the relative course of an animation, a instance specifies the precise timing when a particular key frame should take place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個主要畫面格的指定該索引鍵的畫面格的結束時。Each key frame's specifies when that key frame ends. 其並未指定多久的 key time 播放。It does not specify how long the key time plays. 主要畫面格的播放時間量取決於主要畫面格的結束時間、前一個主要畫面格的結束時間，以及動畫的持續期間。The amount of time a key frame plays is determined by when the key frame ends, when the previous key frame ended, and the animation's duration. 請參閱[主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md) for more information. A可能會有多種不同的格式，包括數值的時間值，以百分比表示，或做為其中一個特殊 sentinel 值的方式來表示或。A may be expressed in several different formats, including a numeric time value, as a percentage, or as one of the special sentinel values or . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>\<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> \-或-\- or - \<*物件**屬性*="[*天*。]*小時*:*分鐘*"/ >\<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> \-或-\- or - \<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/>\<*object* *property*="*pctValue*%"/> \-或-\- or - \<*object* *property*=""/>\<*object* *property*=""/> \-或-\- or - \<*object* *property*=""/>\<*object* *property*=""/> ## XAML 值XAML Values *天**days* 整數值大於或等於 0，指定由此跨裝置填滿的天數。An integer value greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the number of days spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *小時**hours* 指定由此跨裝置填滿的時數的整數值介於 0 到 23 之間。An integer value between 0 and 23 that specifies the number of hours spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *分鐘**minutes* 指定由此跨裝置填滿的分鐘數的整數值介於 0 到 59 之間。An integer value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of minutes spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *seconds**seconds* 浮點值介於 0 到 59 之間，指定由此跨裝置填滿的秒數。A floating-point value between 0 and 59 that specifies the number of seconds spanned by this . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *fractionalSeconds**fractionalSeconds* 整數值 1 到 7 位數所組成，指定小數秒數。An integer value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that specifies fractional seconds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. *pctValue**pctValue* 浮點值介於 0 到 100 (含)，會指定這動畫總持續時間的百分比。A floating-point value between 0 and 100, inclusive, that specifies this as a percentage of the animation's total duration. 這後面必須接著常值字元`%`。如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。This should be followed by the literal character `%`.For more information, see the property.

summary.span: 取得 值，這個值建立的時間行為會導致動畫以常速進行插補。

span.span: Gets the value which creates timing behavior resulting in an animation that interpolates at a constant rate.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當索引鍵時間設定為，根據每個主要畫面格，以判斷每個畫面格的持續時間的長度配置可用的時間。When a key time is set to , available time is allocated according to the length of each of the key frames to determine the duration of each frame. 這將提供的行為，"velocity"或動畫的速度將會維持不變。This will provide the behavior that the "velocity" or pace of the animation will remain constant.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Percent { get; }
.property instance float64 Percent
Public ReadOnly Property Percent As Double
public: property double Percent { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得主要畫面格的結束時間，以動畫總持續時間的百分比表示。

span.span: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a percentage of the total duration of the animation.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當索引鍵的時間以百分比表示時，主要畫面格結束時間指定的主要畫面格動畫持續時間的百分比。When a key time is expressed as a percentage, the key frame ending time is specified as a percentage of the duration of the key frame animation. 例如，如果主要畫面格動畫有 4 秒和 75%的持續時間指定為主要畫面格的百分比，主要畫面格將會在第 3 秒後結束。For example, if a key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and 75% is given as the percentage for the key frame, the key frame will end after the 3rd second.

exception.span: 如果這個執行個體不是 型別。

span.span: If this instance is not of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan TimeSpan { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan TimeSpan
Public ReadOnly Property TimeSpan As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan TimeSpan { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 取得以動畫開始時間之相對時間表示的主要畫面格結束時間。

span.span: Gets the time when the key frame ends expressed as a time relative to the beginning of the animation.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當索引鍵的時間會表示為時間範圍時，主要畫面格結束時間指定為相對於動畫開始時間。When a key time is expressed as a time span, the key frame ending time is specified as a time relative to the beginning of the animation. 例如，如果時間範圍設定為"0:0:2 」 時，主要畫面格會結束兩秒之後動畫開始。For example, if the time span is set to "0:0:2", the key frame will end two seconds after the animation begins.

exception.span: 如果這個執行個體不是 型別。

span.span: If this instance is not of type .

summary.span: 取得 值，這個值會在主要畫面格之間平均分佈指定的動畫時間。

span.span: Gets the value which divides the allotted time of the animation evenly between key frames.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當索引鍵時間設定為，主要畫面格之間平均分配分配的動畫時間總計。When a key time is set to , the total allotted time of the animation is divided evenly between key frames. 比方說，如果主要畫面格動畫的持續時間為 4 秒，而且有四個主要畫面格，每一個主要畫面格將最後一個第二個和前一個結束後，立即開始。For example, if the key frame animation has a duration of four seconds and there are four key frames, each key frame will last for one second and begin immediately after the preceding one ends.
